T16TD4388E:318a-0: @318a * // rgyal po la gtam bya ba rin po che'i phreng ba las byung ba'i smon lam tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu pa bzhugs so //
T16TD4388E:318a-2: * // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T16TD4388E:318a-3: de phyir sku gzugs mchod rten gyi //
T16TD4388E:318a-4: spyan snga'am yang na gzhan du'ang rung //
T16TD4388E:318a-5: tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu 'di //
T16TD4388E:318a-6: nyin gcig bzhin yang dus gsum brjod //
T16TD4388E:318a-7: sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dun dang //
T16TD4388E:318a-8: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang //
T16TD4388E:318a-9: rnam kun btud de skyabs mchis nas //
T16TD4388E:318a-11: sdig pa'i las ni ldog bgyid cing //
T16TD4388E:318a-12: bsod nams thams cad yongs su gzung //
T16TD4388E:318a-13: lus can kun gyi bsod nams dag / kun la rjes su yi rang ngo //
T16TD4388E:318a-14: bdag ni spyi btud thal sbyar te //
T16TD4388E:318a-15: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor slad dang //
T16TD4388E:318a-16: 'gro gnas bar du bzhugs slad du //
T16TD4388E:318a-17: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la gsol //
T16TD4388E:318a-18: de ltar bgyi ba'i bsod nams dag //
T16TD4388E:318a-19: bdag gis bgyis dang ma bgyis gang //
T16TD4388E:318a-20: des ni sems can thams cad kyang //
T16TD4388E:318b-0: @318b bla med byang chub sems ldan shog / sems can thams cad dri med dbang //
T16TD4388E:318b-1: yongs rdzogs mi khom kun 'das shing //
T16TD4388E:318b-2: spyod pa rang dbang yod pa dang //
T16TD4388E:318b-3: tshor ba bzang dang ldan par shog / lus can dag ni thams cad kyang //
T16TD4388E:318b-4: lag na rin chen nyid ldan zhing //
T16TD4388E:318b-5: yo byad thams cad mtha' yas pa //
T16TD4388E:318b-6: 'khor ba srid du mi zad shog / bud med thams cad dus kun tu //
T16TD4388E:318b-7: skyes mchog nyid du gyur par shog / lus can thams cad rig pa dang //
T16TD4388E:318b-8: rkang par ldan pa nyid du shog / lus can kha dog ldan pa dang //
T16TD4388E:318b-9: gzugs bzang gzi brjid che ba dang //
T16TD4388E:318b-10: blta na sdug cing nad med dang //
T16TD4388E:318b-11: stobs can tshe dang ldan par shog / thams cad thabs la mkhas gyur te //
T16TD4388E:318b-12: sdug bsngal kun las thar ba dang //
T16TD4388E:318b-13: dkon mchog gsum la gzhol bar bya //
T16TD4388E:318b-14: sangs rgyas chos nor che ldan shog / byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang //
T16TD4388E:318b-15: nyon mongs btang snyoms gnas pa dang //
T16TD4388E:318b-16: sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus //
T16TD4388E:318b-17: bsam gtan shes rab kyis brgyan cing //
T16TD4388E:318b-18: tshogs rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs te //
T16TD4388E:318b-19: mtshan dang dpe byad gsal ba dang //
T16TD4388E:318b-20: bsam gyis mi khyab sa bcu dag / rgyun mi 'chad par bgrod par shog / bdag kyang yon tan de dag dang //
T16TD4388E:318b-21: gzhan kun gyis kyang brgyan ldan te //
T16TD4388E:318b-22: nyes pa kun las grol ba dang //
T16TD4388E:318b-23: sems can kun mchog byams pa dang //
T16TD4388E:318b-24: sems can kun yid re ba yi //
T16TD4388E:318b-25: dge ba thams cad rdzogs bgyid cing //
T16TD4388E:318b-26: rtag tu lus can thams cad kyi //
T16TD4388E:318b-27: sdug bsngal bsal bar bgyid bar shog /'jig rten kun na skye bo gang //
T16TD4388E:318b-28: su dag 'jigs pas skyo ba ste //
T16TD4388E:318b-29: bdag gi ming tsam thos pas kyang //
T16TD4388E:318b-30: shin tu 'jigs pa med par shog / bdag ni mthong dang dran pa dang //
T16TD4388E:318b-31: mi gtsang thos pa'i skye bo kun //
T16TD4388E:318b-32: rab dang 'khrug med rnal ma dang //
T16TD4388E:318b-33: rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges pa dang //
T16TD4388E:318b-34: tshe rabs kun du rjes 'brang ba'i //
T16TD4388E:318b-35: mngon shes lnga po thob par shog / sems can kun la rnam kun du //
T16TD4388E:318b-36: rtag tu phan bde bgyid par shog /'jig rten kun na skye bo gang //
T16TD4388E:319a-0: @319a * // sdig pa byed par 'dod gyur pa //
T16TD4388E:319a-1: de dag thams cad gnod med par //
T16TD4388E:319a-2: rtag tu cig car zlog gyur cig / sa dang chu dang me dang rlung //
T16TD4388E:319a-3: sman dang dgon pa'i shing bzhin du //
T16TD4388E:319a-4: rtag tu sems can thams cad kyis //
T16TD4388E:319a-5: rang dgar dgag med spyod par shog /
T16TD4388E:319a-6: sems can rnams la srog bzhin phangs //
T16TD4388E:319a-7: bdag la de dag ches phangs shog / bdag la de dag sdig smin cing //
T16TD4388E:319a-8: bdag dge ma lus der smin shog / ji srid sems can 'ga' zhig kyang //
T16TD4388E:319a-9: gang du ma grol de srid du //
T16TD4388E:319a-10: de phyir bla na med pa yi //
T16TD4388E:319a-11: byang chub thob kyang gnas gyur cig / de skad brjod pa'i bsod nams gang //
T16TD4388E:319a-12: gal te de ni gzugs can gyur //
T16TD4388E:319a-13: gang ga'i bye ma snyed kyis ni //
T16TD4388E:319a-15: slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa //
T16TD4388E:319a-16: rgyal po la gtam bya ba rin po che'i phreng ba las byung ba'i smon lam gyi tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu pa rdzogs so//
